nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hi Person1, There is no interaction between the aspirin and the verzenio, so you should continue to take it if that is what your doctor  wants who manages that condition. It looks like Dr. Person2 was ok with you waiting til  MM/DD/YYYY to start the new medication  and yes we can prescribe imodium for you.
